description:
Be prepared on the water with a well-stocked safety kit. The tow line, whistle and a bailer for quickly emptying excess H2O are all required by Transport Canada while on the water.

  • 15m of line gives you enough rope to get you out of a sticky situation on flat water
  • Whistle to alert other members of your party that you're in trouble
  • Shatter-resistant container doubles as a bailing bucket
  • Water resistant LED flashlight with AA batteries
  • Heat reflective survival blanket
name: Level Six Boaters Kit
